Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Kerozen Isle has been overrun with dangerous creatures who threaten the inhabitants each day.

Defeat the {@LinkCreature:10#1#arachnen warriors}, {@LinkCreature:10#2#grove kamaras}, {@LinkCreature:10#3#virek kamaras}, and {@LinkCreature:10#10#baykun warthogs} that threaten routine troop movements.

Report to Coordinator Briale when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
